name: X Sender
description: X Sender can work on all devices for easy data sharing & file transfer. It can transfer images, videos and other files over wifi more quickly than other data sharing services. It will enable you to create hotspot using this data sharing app and share with others more easily. This fX Sender app can work offline without any data connection or data cost for the purpose of file sharing. How to use X Sender app for data sharing; File transfer app will make you transfer files more easily than other apps. Lets see how it will enable you for data sharing on your smartphone: 1- Install and start using X Sender app 2- Click on the type of content you want to share like image share or video sharing 3- Select files to transfer using data sharing app 4- Click send or receive button to start sending large files or receiving with X Sender app 5- Ask other friend to install X Sender  data sharing app and enable file sharing 6- Connect with your friends mobile easily using X Sender app 7- Start file sharing with many amazing features
